resources.string: The &appname; Project is a project created to inform my friend\'s when i published a new blogpost

The &appname;-App checks in the morning at 07:00 o\'clock if the website &channel_url; has been updated. If the web page has been updated, a notification will be displayed. By clicking on the notification the website &channel_url; can be visit.
Thank you Jesus that you died for me on the cross and rose again.
Thank you sea for your help in developing the app
&appname;-App can also be started manually to check the website &channel_url;. For this, only the round button on the start page must be pressed.
